targets.rawSql:
WITH latest_block AS (
    SELECT MAX(b.number) AS block_number
    FROM metagraph_block b
    WHERE b.timestamp <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
)
SELECT
    SUM(ns.total_stake) / 1e9 AS total_tao_staked
FROM metagraph_neuron_snapshot ns
JOIN latest_block lb ON ns.block_id = lb.block_number

WITH latest_block AS (
    SELECT MAX(b.number) AS block_number
    FROM metagraph_block b
    WHERE b.timestamp <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
)
SELECT
    SUM(ns.total_stake) / 1e9 AS root_stake
FROM metagraph_neuron_snapshot ns
JOIN metagraph_neuron n ON ns.neuron_id = n.id
JOIN latest_block lb ON ns.block_id = lb.block_number
WHERE n.subnet_id = 0

WITH latest_block AS (
    SELECT MAX(b.number) AS block_number
    FROM metagraph_block b
    WHERE b.timestamp <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
)
SELECT
    SUM(ns.total_stake) / 1e9 AS alpha_stake
FROM metagraph_neuron_snapshot ns
JOIN metagraph_neuron n ON ns.neuron_id = n.id
JOIN latest_block lb ON ns.block_id = lb.block_number
WHERE n.subnet_id > 0

WITH stake_by_block AS (
    SELECT
        b.timestamp AS time,
        SUM(CASE WHEN n.subnet_id = 0 THEN ns.total_stake ELSE 0 END) AS root_stake,
        SUM(CASE WHEN n.subnet_id > 0 THEN ns.total_stake ELSE 0 END) AS alpha_stake,
        SUM(ns.total_stake) AS total_stake
    FROM metagraph_neuron_snapshot ns
    JOIN metagraph_neuron n ON ns.neuron_id = n.id
    JOIN metagraph_block b ON ns.block_id = b.number
    WHERE b.timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom()::timestamp AND $__timeTo()::timestamp
    GROUP BY b.timestamp
)
SELECT
    time,
    CASE WHEN total_stake > 0 THEN (root_stake::numeric / total_stake * 100) ELSE 0 END AS "Total Root Stake",
    CASE WHEN total_stake > 0 THEN (alpha_stake::numeric / total_stake * 100) ELSE 0 END AS "Total Alpha Stake"
FROM stake_by_block
ORDER BY time

WITH time_boundaries AS (
    SELECT
        $__timeTo()::timestamp AS end_time,
        $__timeTo()::timestamp - INTERVAL '1 hour' AS start_1h,
        $__timeTo()::timestamp - INTERVAL '1 day' AS start_1d,
        $__timeTo()::timestamp - INTERVAL '1 week' AS start_1w,
        $__timeTo()::timestamp - INTERVAL '1 month' AS start_1m
),
latest_snapshot AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (n.id)
        n.id AS neuron_id,
        n.subnet_id,
        h.hotkey,
        COALESCE(NULLIF(h.label, ''), LEFT(h.hotkey, 8) || '...') AS validator_name,
        ns.total_stake / 1e9 AS stake_tao,
        ns.is_validator
    FROM metagraph_neuron n
    JOIN metagraph_hotkey h ON n.hotkey_id = h.id
    JOIN metagraph_neuron_snapshot ns ON ns.neuron_id = n.id
    JOIN metagraph_block b ON ns.block_id = b.number
    WHERE n.subnet_id = ${subnet}
      AND ns.is_validator = true
      AND b.timestamp <= (SELECT end_time FROM time_boundaries)
    ORDER BY n.id, b.timestamp DESC
),
emissions_1h AS (
    SELECT
        n.id AS neuron_id,
        SUM(ns.emissions) AS total_emissions,
        AVG(ns.total_stake) AS avg_stake
    FROM metagraph_neuron n
    JOIN metagraph_neuron_snapshot ns ON ns.neuron_id = n.id
    JOIN metagraph_block b ON ns.block_id = b.number
    WHERE n.subnet_id = ${subnet}
      AND ns.is_validator = true
      AND b.timestamp BETWEEN (SELECT start_1h FROM time_boundaries) AND (SELECT end_time FROM time_boundaries)
    GROUP BY n.id
),
emissions_1d AS (
    SELECT
        n.id AS neuron_id,
        SUM(ns.emissions) AS total_emissions,
        AVG(ns.total_stake) AS avg_stake
    FROM metagraph_neuron n
    JOIN metagraph_neuron_snapshot ns ON ns.neuron_id = n.id
    JOIN metagraph_block b ON ns.block_id = b.number
    WHERE n.subnet_id = ${subnet}
      AND ns.is_validator = true
      AND b.timestamp BETWEEN (SELECT start_1d FROM time_boundaries) AND (SELECT end_time FROM time_boundaries)
    GROUP BY n.id
),
emissions_1w AS (
    SELECT
        n.id AS neuron_id,
        SUM(ns.emissions) AS total_emissions,
        AVG(ns.total_stake) AS avg_stake
    FROM metagraph_neuron n
    JOIN metagraph_neuron_snapshot ns ON ns.neuron_id = n.id
    JOIN metagraph_block b ON ns.block_id = b.number
    WHERE n.subnet_id = ${subnet}
      AND ns.is_validator = true
      AND b.timestamp BETWEEN (SELECT start_1w FROM time_boundaries) AND (SELECT end_time FROM time_boundaries)
    GROUP BY n.id
),
emissions_1m AS (
    SELECT
        n.id AS neuron_id,
        SUM(ns.emissions) AS total_emissions,
        AVG(ns.total_stake) AS avg_stake
    FROM metagraph_neuron n
    JOIN metagraph_neuron_snapshot ns ON ns.neuron_id = n.id
    JOIN metagraph_block b ON ns.block_id = b.number
    WHERE n.subnet_id = ${subnet}
      AND ns.is_validator = true
      AND b.timestamp BETWEEN (SELECT start_1m FROM time_boundaries) AND (SELECT end_time FROM time_boundaries)
    GROUP BY n.id
)
SELECT
    ls.validator_name,
    ls.stake_tao,
    CASE WHEN e1h.avg_stake > 0 THEN (e1h.total_emissions::numeric / e1h.avg_stake) * 24 * 365 * 100 ELSE 0 END AS apy_1h,
    CASE WHEN e1d.avg_stake > 0 THEN (e1d.total_emissions::numeric / e1d.avg_stake) * 365 * 100 ELSE 0 END AS apy_1d,
    CASE WHEN e1w.avg_stake > 0 THEN (e1w.total_emissions::numeric / e1w.avg_stake) * 52 * 100 ELSE 0 END AS apy_1w,
    CASE WHEN e1m.avg_stake > 0 THEN (e1m.total_emissions::numeric / e1m.avg_stake) * 12 * 100 ELSE 0 END AS apy_1m
FROM latest_snapshot ls
LEFT JOIN emissions_1h e1h ON ls.neuron_id = e1h.neuron_id
LEFT JOIN emissions_1d e1d ON ls.neuron_id = e1d.neuron_id
LEFT JOIN emissions_1w e1w ON ls.neuron_id = e1w.neuron_id
LEFT JOIN emissions_1m e1m ON ls.neuron_id = e1m.neuron_id
WHERE ls.stake_tao > 0
ORDER BY ls.stake_tao DESC

list.definition: SELECT netuid AS __value, COALESCE(NULLIF(name, ''), 'Subnet ' || netuid::text) AS __text FROM metagraph_subnet ORDER BY netuid
list.label: Subnet
list.name: subnet
list.query: SELECT netuid AS __value, COALESCE(NULLIF(name, ''), 'Subnet ' || netuid::text) AS __text FROM metagraph_subnet ORDER BY netuid
